message: Let's split it evenly. This way we both get a fair share.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers
I'm willing to give you a bit more than our even split offer, but I need to get at least 6000 to make it worthwhile for me.
Considering inflation, my offer is more generous than it seems
I'm going to need a bigger share to make it worth it for me after the inflation.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you another chance
This is my final offer. It's the best I can do with the inflation rate.  If you reject it, we both get nothing.
I'm willing to take a bigger share, but you still get something
This is my absolute final offer.  Take it or we both get nothing.
You're running out of time, take what you can get
I'm taking the majority of the money since I've been taking the brunt of the inflation.  This is my final, final offer.
